classes.name: Account and Service Issues
classes.description: Complaints, questions, or issues related to Vodafone accounts, billing, service disruptions (internet, calls), and technical problems. This includes requests for assistance and reports of unsatisfactory service.

classes.name: Vodafone Cash and Financial Transactions
classes.description: Comments related to Vodafone Cash services, including transfers, balance issues, promotions, and problems with using the service. Also includes questions about linking accounts and issues with third-party payment services like Fawry.

classes.name: Promotions and Offers
classes.description: Questions about current promotions, offers, and deals from Vodafone, including eligibility, availability, and terms and conditions. This includes perceived misleading or 'fake' offers.

classes.name: Customer Service and Support
classes.description: Comments about the quality of Vodafone's customer service, including response times, helpfulness, and overall satisfaction with the support provided. This includes requests for direct assistance and complaints about unhelpful staff.
examples: ุญุฏ ูุฑุฏ ุฎุงุต

classes.name: Network Coverage and Quality
classes.description: Feedback on the quality and reliability of Vodafone's network coverage, including signal strength, data speeds, and call quality. This includes comparisons with other providers.

classes.name: Device and Router Inquiries
classes.description: Questions about Vodafone's devices (phones, routers), including pricing, availability, and compatibility. This includes issues with router performance and requests for technical support.

classes.name: General Inquiries and Information Requests
classes.description: General questions about Vodafone's services, plans, and policies. This includes requests for information about specific features, codes, or procedures.

classes.name: Negative Sentiment and Complaints
classes.description: Comments expressing dissatisfaction, anger, or frustration with Vodafone. This includes accusations of theft, fraud, and poor service.
keywords: ุงุณุชูุฒุงุฒ

classes.name: Positive Sentiment and Appreciation
classes.description: Comments expressing positive feelings towards Vodafone, including praise for their services, products, or customer support.

classes.name: Competition and Switching Providers
classes.description: Comments mentioning other mobile providers (e.g., WE, Etisalat, Orange, Ooredoo, Omantel) and discussing switching between them. This includes comparisons of services and expressions of intent to switch.
